activities: Personal Information Received From the EU: AlphaDetail offers on-line market research and marketing solutions to pharmaceutical companies and biotechnology companies. We enable our clients to reach healthcare professionals and patients and conduct on-line market research surveys, product promotions and disease education programs. We currently collect information from physicians and patients when they register on our web site to participate in online sessions. Online sessions may be in the form of market research surveys or other interactive sessions.
eucountries: France, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU SAFE HARBOR PROGRAM, Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc.
